title: Community Planting Day
description: Join us for a day of planting and learning about sustainable gardening practices. All tools and materials provided.

title: Yoga in the Park
description: Start your morning with a rejuvenating yoga session led by a certified instructor. Bring your own mat!

title: Permaculture Workshop
description: Learn the basics of permaculture and how to create sustainable ecosystems. Includes a farm tour and hands-on activities.

title: Winter Solstice Celebration
description: Celebrate the winter solstice with music, storytelling, and a potluck dinner. Bring a dish to share!

title: Composting 101
description: Discover the art of composting and how to turn waste into valuable soil. Perfect for beginners.
